nodes.text: Wanted Poster: Princess Leia Organa was a poster produced by the Galactic Empire sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War. It depicted Leia Organa, the Human female Princess of Alderaan and known Rebel supporter who was directly involved in the events leading to the destruction of the Empire's first Death Star battlestation.

Wanted Poster: Princess Leia Organa depicted two images—one from the front and another from the side—of Leia Organa, the Human female Princess of Alderaan and known Rebel sympathizer who was instrumental in the events leading to the destruction of the Death Star, an Imperial superweapon, in the space above the moon Yavin 4. Aurebesh text, the alphabet of Galactic Basic Standard, along the top read "ALIAS: PRINCESS LEIA," while the text at the bottom read "WANTED" with the Imperial emblem in the left-bottom corner. The poster was colored in shades of blue and green.

The poster was created and produced by the Galactic Empire sometime after the Battle of Yavin of 0 BBY during the Galactic Civil War, a series of conflicts between the Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Imperial stormtroopers were known to carry copies of the poster on their person.

Wanted Poster: Princess Leia Organa was a poster that appeared in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. It could be looted by the player from the corpses of fallen stormtroopers, along with wanted posters for Luke Skywalker and Han Solo. The picture used in the poster is of the in-game model used for Organa. The player could use the poster as decoration in one of their personal structures.
